/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is flanked by lush green trees, their leaves forming a verdant canopy over the road. The buildings on either side of the street are predominantly white and gray, their modern architecture reflecting the city's contemporary aesthetic. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image appears to have been captured using a fisheye lens, which distorts the edges of the frame, adding a unique perspective to the photograph.
